author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
While the Beacons of Gondor make for one of the most awe-inspiring shots in The Lord of the Rings trilogy, the books show us a much different method Gondor used to call for aid.  Today, we look at The Red Arrow, Tolkien's inspirations, and Borondir - one of the greatest riders of the realm!

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: How Gondor REALLY Calls For Aid - The Red Arrow
